description.p: FossFLOW is a powerful, open-source Progressive Web App (PWA) for creating beautiful isometric diagrams. Built with React and the Isoflow library, it runs entirely in your browser with offline support.

ul.li: Isometric Diagramming - Create stunning 3D-style technical diagrams
Auto-Save - Your work is automatically saved every 5 seconds
PWA Support - Install as a native app on Mac and Linux
Privacy-First - All data stored locally in your browser
Import/Export - Share diagrams as JSON files
Session Storage - Quick save without dialogs
Offline Support - Work without internet connection
